p: Manuscripts must conform to the Journal’s formatting and style requirements and should be no more than 5500 words in length, including references, tables, etc. The manuscript preparation guide and online submission process can be accessed on the Journals website at: https://uk.sagepub.com/en-gb/afr/journal/south-african-journal-psychology#submission-guidelines. Manuscripts not conforming to the Journal’s formatting requirements will be returned without review.
